title: Mythical Beast Sanctuary Adventure #41
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Beast Keeper's Lodge
rooms.description: A rustic wooden lodge filled with the scent of hay and exotic herbs. Maps of the sanctuary cover the walls, showing various beast enclosures. A large fireplace dominates one wall, its embers still glowing faintly. Shelves are lined with journals, feeding schedules, and veterinary supplies. Through the window, you can see the vast sanctuary grounds with their magical barriers shimmering in the distance.

items.name: keeper's desk
items.description: A sturdy oak desk covered with papers, maps, and beast care manuals

items.name: sanctuary charter
items.description: An official document establishing the sanctuary
items.text: CHARTER OF THE MYTHICAL BEAST SANCTUARY - Established 1847 by Master Keeper Aldric Thornwood. Purpose: To provide safe haven for endangered mythical creatures. Primary residents: Phoenix (fire enclosure), Griffin (mountain enclosure), Dragon (cavern enclosure). All keepers must know the sanctuary's history and purpose.

items.name: bronze key
items.description: A bronze key with a griffin emblem engraved on it

items.name: tall bookshelf
items.description: Shelves packed with beast care manuals and journals

items.name: keeper's personal journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal with daily entries
items.text: Day 127: The beasts are restless. Master Keeper Aldric would know what to do, but he's been gone for weeks. The phoenix in the fire enclosure seems agitated. I've secured the emergency supplies in the locked cabinet. If anyone needs to evacuate, they must understand what we protect here and who founded this sanctuary.

items.name: locked supply cabinet
items.description: A tall metal cabinet with a bronze lock and a griffin symbol

items.name: beast handler's protective gear
items.description: Enchanted leather gear that protects against fire, claws, and magic

items.name: emergency evacuation map
items.description: A detailed map showing escape routes
items.text: EMERGENCY EVACUATION PROCEDURES: In case of barrier failure or beast escape, proceed through sanctuary grounds to the Freedom Gate. Gate requires keeper authorization. You must confirm: Who founded the sanctuary? What is our purpose? Where does the phoenix reside?

items.name: sanctuary wall map
items.description: A large map showing all beast enclosures and facilities
items.text: SANCTUARY LAYOUT: Fire Enclosure (Phoenix) - Northeast section. Mountain Enclosure (Griffin) - Western cliffs. Cavern Enclosure (Dragon) - Southern caves. Freedom Gate - Northern exit. All enclosures protected by magical barriers.

items.name: stone fireplace
items.description: A large fireplace with embers still glowing

items.name: hidden note
items.description: A note tucked behind a loose stone in the fireplace
items.text: Emergency note from Aldric: If you're reading this, something has gone wrong. The sanctuary was built to provide safe haven for mythical beasts. Remember our purpose. The combination to my desk is the year we opened - 1847.

items.name: heavy wooden door
items.description: A reinforced door leading out to the sanctuary grounds

rooms.name: Sanctuary Grounds
rooms.description: A vast open area with multiple beast enclosures visible in different directions. Magical barriers shimmer around each enclosure, containing the powerful creatures within. To the northeast, flames dance in the phoenix's fire enclosure. To the west, a griffin perches majestically on mountain rocks. To the south, you hear the rumbling of a dragon in its cavern. The Freedom Gate stands to the north, sealed with powerful enchantments.

items.name: fire enclosure
items.description: A blazing enclosure where a magnificent phoenix spreads its flaming wings
items.text: PHOENIX ENCLOSURE: Species - Immortal Phoenix. Habitat - Fire enclosure with eternal flames. Status - Healthy. Note: Phoenix feathers have healing properties. This majestic bird has been with us since the sanctuary's founding.

items.name: mountain enclosure
items.description: A rocky mountain habitat where a proud griffin surveys its territory
items.text: GRIFFIN ENCLOSURE: Species - Noble Griffin. Habitat - Mountain enclosure with high perches. Status - Alert. Note: Griffins are fiercely loyal and protective. This one was rescued from poachers by Master Keeper Aldric himself.

items.name: cavern enclosure
items.description: A deep cavern where a dragon's golden eyes gleam in the darkness
items.text: DRAGON ENCLOSURE: Species - Ancient Dragon. Habitat - Cavern enclosure with treasure hoard. Status - Sleeping. Note: Dragons are highly intelligent and long-lived. Handle with extreme caution and respect.

items.name: sanctuary information board
items.description: A wooden board with posted notices and information
items.text: SANCTUARY MISSION: We provide safe haven for endangered mythical creatures. Founded by Master Keeper Aldric Thornwood in 1847. Our purpose is to protect and preserve these magnificent beings for future generations. All staff must understand and honor this sacred duty.

items.name: central feeding station
items.description: A stone structure with supplies for feeding the various beasts

items.name: master keeper's badge
items.description: A silver badge bearing Aldric Thornwood's name and the sanctuary seal

items.name: observation post
items.description: A raised platform for monitoring the beast enclosures

items.name: beast monitoring log
items.description: A logbook tracking the health and behavior of all sanctuary beasts
items.text: MONITORING LOG: Phoenix (Fire Enclosure) - Molting cycle normal. Griffin (Mountain Enclosure) - Hunting skills excellent. Dragon (Cavern Enclosure) - Hibernation period ending soon. All beasts are thriving under our care. Master Keeper Aldric's dedication to providing safe haven has made this sanctuary a success.

items.name: memorial stone
items.description: A carved stone honoring the sanctuary's founder
items.text: IN MEMORY OF MASTER KEEPER ALDRIC THORNWOOD - Founder and protector of mythical beasts. His vision: to provide safe haven where these magnificent creatures could live free from persecution. His legacy endures in every beast we shelter.

items.name: Freedom Gate
items.description: A massive enchanted gate leading to freedom beyond the sanctuary. Three glowing questions appear on its surface, requiring keeper authorization to open.

password_questions.question: Who founded this sanctuary?
password_questions.hint: Check the sanctuary charter and memorial stone

password_questions.question: What is the sanctuary's purpose?
password_questions.hint: The charter and information board explain the sanctuary's mission

password_questions.question: Where does the phoenix reside?
password_questions.hint: Look at the enclosure signs and the evacuation map

rooms.name: Beyond the Sanctuary
rooms.description: You've passed through the Freedom Gate! You stand on a hillside overlooking the sanctuary below, where the mythical beasts continue their peaceful existence behind the shimmering barriers. The phoenix's flames glow in the distance, the griffin soars above its mountain perch, and the dragon's cavern rumbles softly. A path leads down the hill to civilization and safety. You've escaped while ensuring the sanctuary's secrets remain protected.

items.name: winding path
items.description: A clear path leading away from the sanctuary to safety

items.name: view of the sanctuary
items.description: A breathtaking view of the mythical beast sanctuary spread out below
items.text: From here, you can see the entire sanctuary - a testament to Aldric Thornwood's vision. The beasts are safe, and so are you.

rooms.win_message: Congratulations! You've successfully escaped the Mythical Beast Sanctuary while honoring its sacred purpose. You solved the puzzles, learned the sanctuary's history, and proved yourself worthy of passing through the Freedom Gate. The mythical beasts remain safe in their haven, and you carry the knowledge of this magical place with you. You win!
